song.title: Apuva-megamix
song.info:
A Noisetracker MOD
Samples taken from a TV program "Pulttibois" (1989-1991), from characters James Potkukelkka* and his anonymous helper.
*His family name translates as Kicksled. This character always gets stuck in somewhere and then shouts "apuva!" (=Help! ...with an intended spelling mistake, the correct is "apua")
Recording taken from Stone Oakvalley's site http://www.paula8364.com/
